content: sock-along took place in january 2021 full pattern with 3 separate lessons and video tutorials can be found here https //www yarnspirations com/patons-knit-sock-along crochet portion of sock-a-long can be found here 2 socks are knit from the cuff-down the body uses a simple 4-stitch and 2-row repeat of a simple yet striking slip_stitch sock features a traditional turned heel and basic sock shaping pattern requires 2 to 3 balls of patons kroy socks pending size worked 2 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/slip-stitch-cuff-crochet-socks
